author: ralexstokes
content: i definitely want builders to be bonded entities on the consensus chain (like validators) w/ enshrined PBS so that we can start to design slashings for the accountable bad behaviors

author: ralexstokes
content: in the mean time, we can "self-police" and do a lot of what we would like off-chain

author: ralexstokes
content: e.g. i intend to write some mev tooling soon(tm) to essentially be a watch tower that can verify builders/relays follow the `builder-specs` and then as first pass can just raise a loud tweet to get some attention to the foul play
